effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the target’s Speed by one stage.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the target’s Speed by one stage.

short_effect.black_white: Lowers the target’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Lowers the target’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.black_white: The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at opposing Pokémon. This attack reduces the targets’ Speed stat.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user attacks by blowing freezing cold air at opposing Pokémon. This attack reduces the targets’ Speed stat.
